授業目的: In this course students will study the basic principles of global environmental issues and environmental policies.
到達目標:
Students completing this course will be able to:
-Acquire basic knowledge on global environmental issues and the policies of addressing environmental issues
-Expand knowledges of how science interconnects with environmental policy analysis and decision making
-Enhance critical thinking, reading, discussing, presenting, and writing skills
特記事項: 【合併】Global Environmental Policy（総合政策学部）/地球環境政策（総合政策学部）

第1回:
* All 14 classes will be taught face-to-face. 
Course overview, Ecosystem services
第2回:
Evolution & extinction; Human population growth
* Class discussion
第3回:
Global distribution of natural resources; Environmental ethics, Values of ecosystems
* Class discussion.
第4回:
Ecological footprint, Earth's carrying capacity, the role of sciences and technology
＊Class discussion
第5回:
Multilateral environmental agreements
*Introduction to policy memo.
第7回:
Water resource management, hydrologic cycle, water pollution and control
*Policy memo 1st draft due.
第8回: Soil management, agriculture, and future of food production
第9回:
Forest resource management
*Policy memo 2nd draft due.
第10回:
Biodiversity and conservation biology
* Class discussion
第12回: Environmental health and toxicology, Waste management, Energy issues
第13回: Class presentation on policy memos & discussion
